data.actual_result: CPU spikes, and discord app becomes unresponsive
data.expected_result: CPU should not spike and message is deleted
data.short_description: If you copy/paste a large amount of emoji it can crash the app, and causes the CPU to spike
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy and paste an emoji, such as 😱 so that it fills a message. - Try to send 2/3 messages with only emoji - then try to delete them. The CPU will spike
